name: Spider Solitaire Card Game.
description:
Play the best classic card game on iOS, Spider Solitaire.
This game of Spider Solitaire is fun and challenging. Stack all cards of each suit in descending order from King to Ace to win a game in Spider Solitaire.

Spider Solitaire is an exciting twist of very popular classic card game known as Solitaire.

Amazing features:
1. Three suit options - 1, 2 and 4 suits
2. Winning Deals, Guaranteed!
3. Unlimited Hints and Undo
4. Smooth animations, HD graphics and clean interface
5. Day and Night mode
6. Tap to move for quick gameplay
7. Autocomplete feature
8. In-depth game statistics
9. Lots of achievements to win

Spider Solitaire is pretty simple to play, begin with a 1 suit game. Once you have learned the basic moves rise up to 4 suit. If you like playing card games– Spider Solitaire will be a keeper!

Warning: It’s addictive. You wouldn’t be able to stop playing Spider Solitaire.

Download and enjoy Spider Solitaire!
